award-group.award-id: National Centre of Competence in Research (SNSF-NCCR) ‘Plant Survival’
National Centre of Competence in Research (SNSF-NCCR) ‘Plant Survival’

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNSF grant number 31003A_125314 to HMS) and the National Centre of Competence in Research (SNSF-NCCR) ‘Plant Survival’ (to US and HMS). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
